name: Coba And Mayan Culture
description: Join us for an unparalleled cultural encounter with the native Mayas of Playa del Carmen, past and present! On this tour we will climb the great pyramid of Coba, visit Mayan villages, explore enchanted underground caverns, and experience traditional Mayan life.  It is truly a fascinating excursion that will leave you really feeling how the Mayas once lived at the time of the great cities, and how they still live today.
